## Project Details
React.js frontend application with Material-UI (MUI) for user management interface including:
- User list table with search functionality
- Integration with Java Spring Boot backend API
- Real-time search and filtering
- Responsive design with Material-UI components

## Project Details
React.js frontend application with Material-UI (MUI) for user management interface including:
- User list table with search functionality
- Integration with Java Spring Boot backend API
- Real-time search and filtering
- Responsive design with Material-UI components
